channel.title: I need help with a mini game

item.title: I need help with a mini game
item.dc:creator: @Sharkboy2222 Sharkboy2222
item.description:
@Sharkboy2222 wrote:

i have a mini game and everytime i try adding it i get a 100 errors i add it in the right place but does same thing still
here is the mini game if theres a error plz fix it and then send it back

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bgs”) && playerRights >= 0) {
if (playerHasItem(4067, 600)) {
addItem(2745, 1);
deleteItem(4067, 600);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 600 Tickets to get this bandos godsword!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ags”) && playerRights >= 0) {
if (playerHasItem(4067, 550)) {
addItem(2746, 1);
deleteItem(4067, 550);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 550 Tickets to get this armadyl godsword!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“full bandos”) && playerRights >= 0) {
if (playerHasItem(4067, 2000)) {
addItem(7606, 1);
addItem(7607, 1);
addItem(7612, 1);
deleteItem(4067, 2000);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 2000 Tickets to get full bandos!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“full arm”) && playerRights >= 0) {
if (playerHasItem(4067, 2000)) {
addItem(7608, 1);
addItem(7609, 1);
addItem(7613, 1);
deleteItem(4067, 2000);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 2000 Tickets to get full armadyl!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dragon boots”) && playerRights >= 0) {
if (playerHasItem(4067, 400)) {
addItem(7605, 1);
deleteItem(4067, 400);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 400 Tickets to get these dragon boots!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dragon arrows”) && playerRights >= 0) {
if (playerHasItem(4067, 800)) {
addItem(5617, 800);
deleteItem(4067, 800);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 800 Tickets to get these dragon arrows!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dragon full”) && playeRights >= 0) {
if (playerHasItem(4067, 900)) {
addItem(7611, 1);
deleteItem(4067, 900);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 900 Tickets to get this dragon full helm!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“black mask”) && playerRights >= 0) {
if (playerHasItem(4067, 3000)) {
addItem(7632, 1);
deleteItem(4067, 3000);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 3000 Tickets to get this black mask!”);
}[/code]

im using it on a dodian base server
